body: lmao imagine writing an essay in this site, which people dont give a fuck about (the comment section).
Glad you normie chumps can't keep up. Perhaps you should go back to twatter or plebbit and have them explain it to you.
I don't understand what the guy below me said. Is he a hardcore doujin maniac?

The entire thing plus conclusions, it was certainly a bizarre ride full of Kiliu's kiliu-ness. I am sure that Kiliu will miss these series more than the audience itself, here he had a good combo of 4 types of girls and while Kiliu can add as many as they like in their other stuff, usually, they're one off and done. Somehow I think that this one resonates with Kiliu wild world delusions the most. These series deserve their own JAVs, crazier stuff has been turned into live action porn before and I'm sure that the japs can find actors and actresses crazy enough to simply read these and go "oh, ok cool, easy." SDDE or Moodyz style. They better get the body sizes right and some wigs too if necessary. Anyways this was good stuff, appreciate the concept art/rough drafts at the end, goes to show that despite having a rather "balls blunt to the walls" type artsyle, work is put into it. (unlike fucking studio queenbeetch who always butcher the stuff thrown at them with their sheer lazyness.)
Wtf is wrong with their tongue
